name: ManageGithubThreadNotifications
description:
Manage GitHub notifications for specific threads.

Use this tool to ignore future notifications for GitHub threads, or to subscribe to threads you aren't receiving notifications for. Ideal for managing notifications on watched repositories by ignoring or subscribing to specific threads.

parameters.name: notification_thread_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the notification thread, as retrieved from the GitHub notifications API.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the notification thread. This corresponds to the value returned in the `id` field when you retrieve notifications (for example with the [`GET /notifications` operation](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-server@3.8/rest/reference/activity#list-notifications-for-the-authenticated-user)).

parameters.name: ignore_thread_notifications
parameters.description: Set to true to block all notifications from a thread. Use false to allow notifications.

value_schema.description: Whether to block all notifications from a thread.
